row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
! :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_LDAP_PASSWORD#" ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
$Pass = "&PASSWORD#" $User = "&USER#" $VsphereServer = "&VSPHERE_SERVER#"
$OsCustomName = "&VM_NAME_LOWER#" $Fullname = "&FULLNAME#" $OrgName = "&BENEF_BU#" $LicenseMode = "&LICENSEMODE#" $AdminPassword = "&ADMINPASSWORD#" $AutoLogonCount = "&AUTOLOGONCOUNT#" $TimeZone = "&TIMEZONE#" $GuiRunOnce = "&GUIRUNONCE#" $Domain = "&DOMAIN#" $DomainUsername = "&DOMAINUSERNAME#" $DomainPassword = "&DOMAINPASSWORD#" $ChangeSid = "&CHANGESID#" $Type = "&TYPE#" $DnsServer = "&DNSSERVER#" $DnsSuffix = "&DNSSUFFIX#" $TimeZone="&TIMEZONE#" !$ProductKey="&PRODUCTKEY#" $ProductKey="489J6-VHDMP-X63PK-3K798-CPX3Y"
$IpAddress = "&NEW_IP_ADDRESS#" $SubnetMask = "&SUBNETMASK#" $Dns_Primary = "&DNS_PRIMARY#" $Dns_Secondary = "&DNS_SECONDARY#" $DefaultGateway = "&DEFAULTGATEWAY#"
$Password = ConvertTo-SecureString "$Pass" -AsPlainText -Force ! Write-host $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password) ! $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password)
Add-PsSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core Write-host Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass
! Enable-ADAccount -Server $LdapHost -credential $mycredentials -Identity $sAMA
! :IF &PS_OS# = "Linux"
! $custSpec=New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSType Linux -Domain &WF_DOMAIN# ` ! -Name &WF_CUSTOM_NAME# ` ! -Type Persistent ` ! -DnsServer &WF_DNS_SERVER_PRIMARY#, &WF_DNS_SERVER_SECONDARY# ` ! -DnsSuffix &WF_DNS_SUFFIX#
! $osCust = Get-OSCustomizationSpec $custSpec -Type Persistent | ` ! Get-OSCustomizationNicMapping | ` ! Set-OSCustomizationNicMapping -IPMode UseStaticIP -IpAddress &WF_IP_ADDRESS# ` ! -SubnetMask &WF_SUBNET_MASK# -DefaultGateway &WF_DEFAULT_GATEWAY#
! :ELSE
! : IF &PS_OS# = "Windows" !$custSpec=New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec Write-host New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec '&Custom_Name#' -Name $OsCustomName $custSpec=New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec '&Custom_Name#' -Name $OsCustomName
Write-host Set-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec $OsCustomName -Fullname $Fullname -OrgName $OrgName -NamingScheme Fixed -NamingPrefix $OsCustomName -DomainUsername $DomainUsername -DomainPassword $DomainPassword Set-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec $OsCustomName -Fullname $Fullname -OrgName $OrgName -NamingScheme Fixed -NamingPrefix $OsCustomName -DomainUsername $DomainUsername -DomainPassword $DomainPassword ! -ProductKey $ProductKey ! -LicenseMode 'Perseat' ` ! -AdminPassword $AdminPassword ` ! -TimeZone $TimeZone ` ! -GuiRunOnce $GuiRunOnce ` ! -Domain $Domain `
! -ChangeSid ` ! -DnsServer $DnsServer ` ! -DnsSuffix $DnsSuffix $osCust = Get-OSCustomizationSpec $OsCustomName | ` Get-OSCustomizationNicMapping | ` Set-OSCustomizationNicMapping -IPMode UseStaticIP ` -IpAddress $IpAddress ` -SubnetMask $SubnetMask ` -Dns $Dns_Primary, $Dns_Secondary ` -DefaultGateway $DefaultGateway
! : ENDIF
! :ENDIF
! :INCLUDE JOBI.IAAS.VCENTER_DISCONNECT
! delete ! Add-PsSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core -ea "SilentlyContinue" ! Connect-VIServer &WF_VCENTER# -Protocol https -User &WF_VCENTER_USER# -Password &WF_VCENTER_PWD# ! Remove-OSCustomizationSpec &WF_CUSTOM_NAME# -Confirm:$false ! Disconnect-VIServer -Server &WF_VCENTER# -Confirm:$false
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
